analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 22.31. Sanidassanattika, Saññojanagocchakādi🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nosaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: sani dassana ttika saññojana gocchaka ādi  na sanidassana sappaṭigham nosaññojanam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ saññojanaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations in Reverse Order🔽The Book of Conditional Relations in the Triad and Dyad Form🔽With object visible and with object impinging, not subject to cankers, not a condition for cankers, a condition by way of object condition …

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ noganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nooghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham nogantham dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ ganthaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham no ogham dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ oghaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With object visible and with object impinging, not a fetter, a condition by way of object condition …🔽With object visible and with object impinging, not a bond, a condition by way of object condition …🔽With object visible and with object impinging, not a hindrance, a condition by way of object condition …

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ noyogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham no yogam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ yogaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With object visible and with object impinging, not a tie, a condition by way of object condition …

original: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nonīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham no nīvaraṇam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ nīvaraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With respect to cause there are three … With respect to the unobscured there are three.🔽With ignorance as condition there are three. (Abbreviated.)🔽With respect to cause there are three … With respect to the unobscured there are three.🔽With ignorance as condition there are three. (Abbreviated.)

analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham no parāmāsam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ parāmāsaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
